game.name: Skeleton Defense
game.description:
A dangerous virus has suddenly hit your planet and started getting affected by making them become mobile skeletons. Luckily, it has not reached out to you yet. You as a soldier have decided to face off this virus attack and protect the lives of those who have not got affected yet. Common! Join Skeleton Defense game and get ready to stop people from transforming into the disgusting monsters! People of your country see you as a last hope for the humanity. Do not break their hope!
The hordes of undead skeletons will come to you in different waves. Use rockets, grenades, rifles, as well as other effective weapons to give these monsters a befitting reply! There are five different skeleton types to explore and a wonderful seamless gameplay to enjoy in this brand new action packed challenge. Clear level with the best score to buy new upgrades, including ammo and rapid fire speed! Try to be very quick to stand strong against your enemies in this htlml5 defense and zombie game!
This dangerous virus will take a few seconds to transform humans into the killer skeletons. Put your intensive shooting skills to test to the maximum to prevent your enemies from crossing the red line! Do not forget to improve your weapons and kill all your skeletons as fast as you can in this top brainteaser! Play this dynamic gun shooter on your desktop, mobile phone or any other gaming device! Feel free to browse our more free mobile games to beat your boring hours with ease!
